jobs.title: Associate Software Engineer
jobs.introduction: Here I worked on the HEMS project which is a nation-wide examination management system.
descriptions: Contributed to the initial database design of the application to reflect the client's requirements.
Implemented the result-processing module that collects, analyzes marks of around 30,000 students per year, and prepares grades.
Integrated 2 payment gateways that manage a total transaction amount of around 4 million BDT per year.
Implemented REST APIs for mobile apps including JWT authentication.

jobs.title: Software Engineer (External)
jobs.introduction: Remotely worked with Synopsys Inc. as an offshore employee from DSi. Worked on Synopsys-Detect project (now renamed to BlackDuck-Detect) which is a software compositional analysis tool. It scans a software repository to find component, security, and license vulnerabilities resulting from project dependencies.
descriptions: Worked on migrating the Detect project CI/CD pipeline from Jenkins to GitHub Actions.
Fixed the broken analytics dashboard by migrated project analytics data from Google Universal Analytics to Google Analytics 4 (GA4) protocol.
